question: Lieutenant Kumudini Tyagi and Sub Lieutenant Riti Singh, who were making news recently, are related to which of the following Indian forces?
explanation: Lieutenant Kumudini Tyagi and Sub Lieutenant Riti Singh will be the first women officers in the Indian Navy to embark on Navy warships as part of shipâ€™s crew. It is the first time in the history of Indian naval avaiation, two women officers are selected as an 'Observers' (Airborne Tacticians) in the helicopter stream as the part of Multi-Role-Helicopters (MRH)crew.
